ygData.subject: Re: Skill caps
ygData.msgSnippet: I have written a Smithing Guide and posted it on my site. It includes my information on trivial levels along with how much it cost to get to various skill
ygData.messageBody:
I have written a Smithing Guide and posted it on my site. It includes my
information on trivial levels along with how much it cost to get to various
skill levels. You can view it at:

www.dubuque.net/~sirkal/EverQuest.htm

Please e-mail me back with what you think.

At 12:00 AM 4/26/99 EDT, you wrote:
>From: XxKommiexX@...
>
>I would like the same thing. I kind of know what to make, to gain skill. But
>would like to know how to get to banded armor fastest. maybe that a cheat.
or
>not.
